revised_title: Numerical Solution of the Salnikov Thermokinetic Oscillator Problem
tldr: The authors present a finite-difference method for solving the Salnikov thermokinetic oscillator problem, a model of a two-stage chemical reaction with thermokinetic feedback. They compare the results with the Euler method and discuss the stability of the stationary points and Hopf bifurcation points. The alternative method they propose shows superior stability properties and converges to the attracting fixed point for certain initial conditions.
